head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BRADY, REVEREND THOMAS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BRADY, REVEREND THOMAS

block.p: BRADY-Reverend Thomas Edward, S.J. Loving brother of Annabelle Black, Mary White, William, Edward, Joseph, John and Robert. Reposing at Jesuit Chapel, Murray Weigel Hall, 515 East Fordham Road, Bronx, NY. Visiting Friday, 3-5PM. Mass of Christian Burial, Friday, 7:30PM at Murray Weigel Hall Chapel. For information contact Farenga Bros, Inc., Directors.
